statements.statement: The team decided to launch the new product next quarter. John will prepare the marketing plan. The deadline is August 1st.
statements.speaker: Alice

statements.statement: We need to review the budget for the new campaign.
statements.speaker: Bob

statements.statement: The marketing team has completed the initial campaign design. We need to get stakeholder approval by next week.
statements.speaker: Sarah

statements.statement: I'll schedule the review meeting with the stakeholders for Friday.
statements.speaker: Mike

statements.statement: The budget allocation looks good, but we should consider increasing the digital marketing spend.
statements.speaker: Lisa
